frontpage.title: Bhagavad Gita Ch2
frontpage.description:
atha dvitīyodhyāyaḥ
sāṅkhyayogaḥ
अथ द्वितीयोऽध्यायः । साङ्ख्ययोगः
Chapter 2: Sankhya Yoga

info: In chapter two Arjuna accepts the position as a disciple of Lord Krishna and taking complete of Him requests the Lord to instruct him in how to dispel his lamentation and grief. This chapter is oftened deemed as a summary to the emtire Bhagavad-Gita. Here many subjects are explained such as: karma yoga, jnana yoga, sankhya yoga, buddih yoga and the atma which is the soul. Predominance has been given to the immortal nature of the soul existing within all living entities and it has been described in great detail. Thus this chapter is entitled: The Eternal Reality of the Souls' Immortality.
